messages.message: ^ as an aside... I'd love to be able to call the LLM without all the IB scaffolding and context.  This is a scenario where I dont actually need the IB component of the LLM, I just want the appropriate endpoints, security, and infra to call the LLM
+1 on this - submitted a PFR on this yesterday.  Would be extremely beneficial for refining & comparing 2 to extracted text values
